title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Fry the pancetta in olive oil until crisp.
Beat the eggs with the cheese and pepper.
Drain the pasta and combine with the pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Fry the onions and garlic in a pan.
Add tomatoes and simmer, then add grilled chicken and cream.
